Song.title: Turn Your Eyes Upon Jesus
Song.copyright: Words & Music by Hel­en Lem­mel Public domain

Arrangement.text:
Verse 1: [E]O soul, [Edim]are [E]you wear[Esus]y [E]and [Amaj7]trou[A6]bled? [A6]No [Bsus]light [B]in [Bsus]the [B6]dark[B]ness you [E]see? [E]There’s light [Edim]for [E]a [E6]look [E]at the [C#m]Sav[B7]ior, [B]And [E]life [Edim]more [Fdim]a[B]bun[C#m7]dant [F#]and [B B7]free!
Chorus: [E]Turn your [B]eyes upon [C#m]Je[Emaj7/B]sus, Look [A]full in His wonder[Bdim]ful [B]face, [E]And the things [B7/F#]of [E/G#]earth{,} [E]will [B7]grow [C#m]strange[Emaj7/B]ly [A]dim, [C#m]In [Adim]the [E/B]light [B]of [E/B]His [A/B]glo[B6]ry [B7]and [E]grace.
Verse 2: [E]Through death [Edim]in[E]to life [Esus]ev[E]er[Amaj7]last[A6]ing [A6]He [Bsus]passed, [B]and [Bsus]we [B6]fol[B]low Him [E]there; [E]O'er us [Edim]sin [E]no [E6]more [E]hath do[C#m]min[B7]ion [B]For [E Edim]more [Fdim]than [B]con[C#m7]querors [F#]we [B B7]are!
Verse 3: [E]His Word [Edim]shall [E]not fail [Esus]you, [E]He [Amaj7]prom[A6]ised; [A6]Be[Bsus]lieve [B]Him, [Bsus]and [B6]all [B]will be [E]well: [E]Then go [Edim]to [E]a [E6]world [E]that is [C#m]dy[B7]ing, [B]His [E]per[Edim]fect [Fdim]sal[B]va[C#m7]tion [F#]to [B B7]tell!
Arrangement.searchtext: verse 1 o soul are you weary and troubled no light in the darkness you see theres light for a look at the savior and life more abundant and free chorus turn your eyes upon jesus look full in his wonderful face and the things of earth will grow strangely dim in the light of his glory and grace verse 2 through death into life everlasting he passed and we follow him there oer us sin no more hath dominion for more than conquerors we are verse 3 his word shall not fail you he promised believe him and all will be well then go to a world that is dying his perfect salvation to tell
